channel.title: Looking for 2 coders(Forum and in-game) who knows his/her stuff!
channel.description:
Me and Co-owner are looking for coder who is willing to start a RSPS that can be very successful! We are hoping to start fresh and even plan which base to use according to whats easier and well-known to you! We want to add many cool things for players to have fun not just the normal PK, PVM. We can sink money into server when needed and get forums going also. Coders will be given head admins for either forums or in-game. PM this application to me!
Age: Position(Forums Coder or In-game Coder): Past work: Experience: Dedication to a project (on a scale of 1 to 10): Skype/Any type of contact info:

item.title: Looking for 2 coders(Forum and in-game) who knows his/her stuff!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Some advice: You need to provide a little more information. List some of your goals and what you plan to contribute to the project. Make the thread more appealing and youâ€™ll receive more replies from experienced developers.

Read full topic
